participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, loves to explore and express her thoughts creatively.
participant_1.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i am four years old.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and energetic, enjoys outdoor activities and has a passion for coffee.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i am a huge coffee lover. i don't drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker.

content.text: Oh it's ok. Yesterday i was riding bike on mountains
